get.summary: Returns a list of availables files (certificates, IDs, photoIds, musics)
Returns a file identified by its id

delete.summary: deletes a file identified by its id
deletes a file identified by its id and type

get.summary: Returns a list of the contest parameters
Returns a contest parameter identified by its name
Returns a list of danse teachers
Returns a danse teacher identified by its Id

delete.summary: Removes a danse teacher identified by its Id

put.summary: Updates a danse teacher identified by its Id, with the type and its new value

mp3Date.description: upload date, only used for followUp tool
upload date, only used for followUp tool
